metadata.title: USN-4962-1 -- Babel vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Babel incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4962-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-babel-localedata - 2.4.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu1.1 python-babel-doc - 2.4.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu1.1 python-babel - 2.4.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu1.1 python3-babel - 2.4.0+dfsg.1-2ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
